alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Knott; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Perry, northwestern Knott and south central Breathitt Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 631 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rowdy, or 11 miles north of Hazard, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Buck around 635 PM EDT. Ary around 640 PM EDT. Talcum around 645 PM EDT. Bearville, Emmalena, Fisty, Elmrock and Cordia around 650 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Tina, Vest, Ritchie, Carrie, Yellow Mountain and Elic. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
